tr.td: Any T Any N M0 Favourable Site

description.value:
Rhabdomyosarcoma staging is based on the classic TNM staging taking into account favourable/non favourable tumour sites. It is used in paediatric oncology.
**Rhabdomyosarcoma site staging (Variable number: 4.28)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.1, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children (23.12.2019)\' ([EN](https://www.nacr.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-datadictionary-basicvariables-v1.1.pdf), [DE](https://www.nkrs.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-datenstruktur-variablen-der-basisdaten-v1.1.pdf), [FR](https://www.onec.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-dict-des-donnees-variables-de-base-v1.1.pdf), [IT](https://www.snrt.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-dati-oncologici-variabili-di-base-v1.1.pdf))
